channel.title: Aridonix - members status
channel.description:
How do i fix my members when it go's to wear say a "fury" it says you need to be a member to wear this,
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 2035 character-posy = 4522 character-rights = 3 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = 127.0.0.1 character-lastlogin = 20081119 character-energy = 100 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 2673
Thats the settings for the charicter file, can you either help me make members work or, help me get rid of it. Thank you, Aridonix also known as "Teh_Desire"

item.title: Aridonix - members status
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Search;

public boolean wear

Usually finds it the first time.

Read full topic

item.title: Aridonix - members status
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Thanks ill try it.[quote=“Jordiescape, post:3, topic:251333”]Add this under the wear method;

if (wearID == 6585 && memberIntegerGoesHere != 1) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item!"); return false; }
Something like that.[/quote]

Where do i search that? Client.java?

Read full topic

item.title: Aridonix - members status
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Add this under the wear method;

if (wearID == 6585 && memberIntegerGoesHere != 1) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item!"); return false; }
Something like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Aridonix - members status
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Edit the wear method to check if the member integer is 1 before equipping the amulet.

Read full topic
